Articles.Content:
...can you show me an example of what you have done so that i know what to expect

Unfortunately I don't have any examples, as I lost them when I had to re-format my hard drive. I could knock something up though, any specific request? Eg: A mission-specific flag, a mission banner, a planet banner...

hmm well how about something like this

i picked this because i have some other science parts to texture too

Edit: oh whoops did not expect it to be that big also the text is not necessary (also it doesn't have to be that complex)
I assume that it's all just random but in a way that it looks like a circuit board, yes? I'll get on it when I can.
yes it is a circuit board:wink:

In the meantime, however - a flag of mine:

It's designed to look like the flags you get with the stock game, but with a manned capsule. It's kind of a combination of 2/3 of the flags in the game. I also have a version of it with the flag wrinkles, if you want that.

In the meantime, however - a flag of mine:

http://i.imgur.com/fDwuFfq.png

It's designed to look like the flags you get with the stock game, but with a manned capsule. It's kind of a combination of 2/3 of the flags in the game. I also have a version of it with the flag wrinkles, if you want that.

actually that does pretty good but the doing the circuit board for me would show how capable are you of making textures for the new miniaturized science equipment that will soon go with the rucksack

...doing the circuit board for me would show how capable are you of making textures for the new miniaturized science equipment that will soon go with the rucksack

Miniaturised science, eh? Sounds great, would you mind giving me some details on what their purpose would be, what size they would be (for now I would assume that miniature means the same size as, for example: the gravoli detector), and their proportions (horizontal:vertical - EG: 16:9 (average monitor), 4:3, 1:2, etc.)? If you don't want to post them here, Skype's always an option. I'll even give you my word: unless you want me to do so, I will not inform anyone of any of the content in this addon (<-- There's the knock-up NDA).

Maybe I could do some texture work for you, but immo this (good) idea need to be polished... Some suggestions:

- This should be much more big. All your features in so small device is too overpowered. Try to reach some similar to this sizes to get more realism:

http://www.jsc.nasa.gov/jscfeatures/images/hires/sts064-115-021.jpg

http://www.americaspace.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/ymk.jpg

http://www.nasa.gov/centers/johnson/images/content/82247main_e0081.jpg

http://s2.hubimg.com/u/5149491_f248.jpg

http://www.thespacereview.com/archive/436a.jpg

Counting this, if you allow me the suggestions, maybe your model should be more in shapes of this type:

whoa did not expect that also i 've know it was too small but i haven't tried adjusting the size yet until i could get hold of a good texturer, get proper measurements of the KMU and also i didn't a want it to be originaly built completely around the KMU because i thought it would look weird with the fact that it would be covering the jets...

also if you want to do texture work for me at least to be fair, wait for Shan_na to post his example before i can choose (i already saw your texture packs )

Edit: also taking your suggestions in account i have proceeded with making a newer model that will be bigger

Edited February 6, 2014 by Helix935

whoa did not expect that also i 've know it was too small but i haven't tried adjusting the size yet until i could get hold of a good texturer, get proper measurements of the KMU and also i didn't a want it to be originaly built completely around the KMU because i thought it would look weird with the fact that it would be covering the jets...

also if you want to do texture work for me at least to be fair, wait for Shan_na to post his example before i can choose (i already saw your texture packs )

Oh! of course! I didn't realize you have more suggestions awaiting, please excuse me.

Update:

Per suggestions by Proot I have redesigned the Rucksack again although now it is not quite finished i think it should be shown

https://sketchfab.com/show/1d06d0ba278f420a998171199d7b9c63

i still find it weird that the forums won't let me use the sketchfab viewer

Much better concept immo! More suggestions. Obviously an usable version should be much more rounded in corners and a bit more deep (think you need the space for a chute+extra EVA fuel...). And I don't love too much the pyramid effect at the bottom: according with your own feature plans, you should have storage for EVA experiments, so maybe a module with the same width as above for several compartments will be more appropriate.

And well, transmit experiments, should be possible only with remote tech or similars... BTW, how will this be spawned?

Edited February 7, 2014 by Proot

Ok Update (again)

i have updated my model so that it would have some of the containers although i am not done i feel i should at least show off:)

https://sketchfab.com/show/10389df3d2b84ddab5a0a78ad188a99e

again not done also Proot if you mean by spawning the usage of communications i planned on having a separate science container with a transmitter (stock until i can figure out animations) which will be where the science parts are mounted for transmission. maybe at

I'm lovin it. Great work! Try to follow that concept in this way:

And little mockup about how should appear this part in game...

Edit: by spawn I mean... how you will make it appear. For example: maybe you need to do clic in the ship door, once in EVA, to select and use it?

I really quite like it...

This circuit board: monochrome or colour?

Bright grey scale always fit very well with stock, but for the circuits the colour (green base and goldy metals) is very sweet.

Looks nice

to embed sketchfab

[-SKETCHFAB]10389df3d2b84ddab5a0a78ad188a99e[-/SKETCHFAB] (remove the -, simply enclose you model id in between)

by spawn I mean... how you will make it appear. For example: maybe you need to do clic in the ship door, once in EVA, to select and use it?

oh i will release an album later of it being tested

yeah i agree green base and gold materials would be good

@Quellcrist

yeah i agree green base and gold materials would be good

@Quellcrist

yes it is sketch up and i spent 3 hours yesterday trying to fix any gaps before i gave up on it

If you arent too fixated on sketchup and are willing to learn i suggest going to either Blender if you have plenty of time and patience or Wings3D if you want to concentrate on the essential, alternatively if you can export your mesh in a proper format i can take a look and give you a few pointers. (havent touched sketchup but if you can export to obj, dae or 3ds that would be a start)

If you arent too fixated on sketchup and are willing to learn i suggest going to either Blender if you have plenty of time and patience or Wings3D if you want to concentrate on the essential, alternatively if you can export your mesh in a proper format i can take a look and give you a few pointers. (havent touched sketchup but if you can export to obj, dae or 3ds that would be a start)

no offense but i hate blender due to how hard it is to figure because in fact it took me weeks just to figure out how to look around. Athough i have never tried Wings3D but real question is it free?

and i can already export to .dae with sketchup

did a quick interpretation of your concept with a very fast texture (on auto so some issues), always good to explore new concepts

PS: this was done in Wings in 10 minutes or so and yes its free

ok first that's awesome and second i already made a new model with larger containers

here is the album (i will keep doing this until it looks right)

also i just downloaded wings while typing this just so you know.

Edit: also remember the pack is upside down in sketchfab due to me setting the orientation to upside down in sketchup so that itt would appear right side up in KSP

Edited February 8, 2014 by Helix935

Looking good! I'll be getting on with that circuit board texture in an hour or so.

Can I just suggest using a different kind of texture? A circuit board is OK for the less external side of things, yes, but it isn't very stock. I could knock something up that's either high-visibility but still stock-esque, or something that's simply stock-esque... Or both (all 3 including circuit board)? Let me know which you'd like to see the most in order and I'll get to work

EDIT: By the way, just went to make them and realised I don't have a size yet... 1000px2?

Edited February 8, 2014 by Shna_na
Added question

I see nice ideas over here so this is my last suggestion in a time about shape and size for this:

And btw, Texture Replacer Mod could spawn Kerbals without helmet... and jetpack. So maybe you could remade the Survival EVA to be much more realist, like a MMU or similar...
